name: Disney by Loungefly Backpack Hocus Pocus Poster
description:
Sweep everyone off their feet with our bewitching Loungefly Disney Hocus Pocus Poster Mini Backpack. The classic movie poster, from the original film, comes to life with unique, in-house drawn art. Atop a gold-foil star-studded sky, the Sanderson Sisters fly. Applique and debossed details reveal Winifred, Sarah, Mary-and a vacuum cleaner broom-soaring over the moon. The moon is actually a figural pocket, where you can secure smaller items for all your journeys. Billy Butcherson, Max Dennison, Dani Dennison, and Allison gather below at the gates of Old Burial Hill. Binx also makes an appearance, flying over the Sanderson Sisters. Haunting details continue on the side pockets, too, where you'll find the Sanderson Sisters gathered around a cauldron and Billy Butcherson climbing out of his grave. On the back, Max, Dani, Allison, and Billy make an encore appearance before the Old Burial Hill gates, and the shadows of the Sanderson Sisters fly overhead. In the dark, the edges of the moon on the front glow, along with the edges of the vacuum cleaner and outlines for the Sanderson Sisters. On the side pockets, outlines from the cauldron, flames, and the three Sisters glow; Billy Butcherson's outline glows, as well as the skull and crossbones on the tombstone behind him. Make a spellbinding entrance wherever you go with this frightfully fun accessory. The Loungefly Disney Hocus Pocus Poster Mini Backpack is made of vegan leather (polyurethane). Bag has adjustable shoulder straps and gold-colored hardware. Additional features include applique, glow-in-the-dark, debossed, gold foil, and printed details. Take note of the coordinating inside lining. This backpack is an officially licensed Disney product. Backpack dimensions: 9"W x 10.5"H x 4.5"D


Material: Polyester / Faux Leather
Size: 23 x 25 x 11 cm
